column2:
"Nice work! It's good that you could safely
complete your mission even though you're a hack!"

"But I'll keep calling you Loser until watching
you is no longer a white-knuckle experience."

"As of today, I'd say you were about seventh
from the bottom of the ARKS members I've seen."

"Maybe someday it'll start being quicker to
count from the top. Anyway, keep working
hard and aiming high."
